101372.<pc>は 妹からの手紙を\n読んでみた。\n<br><center>\nお姉ち:
read Sister's Letter. Dear Sis. I finally managed to alchemize Shining Tens Flower! Sis,
you need this, right? Ever since I left my sister that day, I've been wondering if I should live on my own
or why I came to this time period. But when Abba-sama told me that my sister was still alive, and I learned my
mission, I understood the reason why I came to this time period. To spend years and decades refining the Tens
Flower, which has a much stronger power than the ordinary Tens Flower. That was my mission. I've always been
a bit of a do-it-yourselfer, but thanks to the help of the people around me, I was able to finish it
this time. You have a great mission, don't you? I'm glad if my alchemy could help you to fulfill your mission
even a little. I really wanted to give it to you with my own hands, but I'm sorry. I don't have time. But I'll
tell you this. I pray that you can fulfill your mission!

101373.<pc>は 妹からの手紙を\n読んでみた。\n<br><center>\nお兄ち:
read Sister's Letter. Dear Brother. I finally managed to alchemize the Shining Tens Flower! Big
brother, you need this, don't you? Ever since I left my brother that day, I've been wondering if I should live
on my own or why I came to this time period. But when Abba-sama told me that my brother was still alive, I
knew my mission and understood why I came to this time period. To spend years and decades refining the Tens
Flower, which has a much stronger power than the ordinary Tens Flower. That was my mission. I've always been
a bit of a do-it-yourselfer, but thanks to the help of the people around me, I was able to finish it
this time. You have a great mission, don't you? I'm glad if my alchemy could help you to fulfill your mission
even a little. I really wanted to give it to you with my own hands, but I'm sorry. I don't have time. But I'll
tell you this. I pray that you can fulfill your mission!

101374.<pc>は 弟からの手紙を\n読んでみた。\n<br><center>\n姉ちゃ:
read Brother's Letter. Dear Sis. I finally managed to alchemize the Shining Tens Flower!
Sis, you need this, right? Ever since I left my sister that day, I've been wondering if I should live alone or

which is much more powerful than the ordinary Tens Flower. That was my mission. I've always been a bit of a

that you have a great mission. I'm glad if my alchemy helped you fulfill that mission, even a little. I really
wanted to give it to you with my own hands, but I'm sorry. I don't have time. But I'll tell you this. I'm
praying for you to fulfill your mission!
